issue.title: [CF 752] Specific being cast - condition
issue.body:
What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
6.1.1

I have a large number of standard "spell cooldown" icons. I want to add a condition so that if the specific spell for that icon is in the process of being cast, the condition will fail (icon will hide). For instance on my warlock I show when Haunt is usable but want to hide it if I am in the process of casting Haunt; Lava Burst for a shaman; Frost Bomb mage etc. Could you assist me with this or let me know if perhaps its just not possible.

Thanks


> Posted by CurseForge user Maven79 | Imported from CurseForge issue #752 | Raw

comments.body:
Just use a Spell Cast condition, entering the name of the cast and setting the slider to Present (the middle value).

Edited Feb 3, 2013

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Works great, thank you.
